section3List: All bookings must be made via the Site or official Sparkle channels.

privacyPage.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPage.subtitle: Your privacy is important to us. Learn how we protect your data.

section1Items: Personal information: name, email, phone number, address, payment details
Account information: username, password, profile photo
Usage data: pages visited, service requests, preferences
Device and log data: IP address, browser type, operating system
section2Items: To provide and manage your bookings and cleaner profiles
To communicate with you regarding services, updates, and promotions
To improve our Services, website, and user experience
To comply with legal obligations and prevent fraud or abuse
